```diff
+         function updateBreakpoint() {
+             const width = window.innerWidth;
+             const indicator = document.getElementById('current-size');
+             
+             let breakpoint = '';
+             if (width >= 1920) {
+                 breakpoint = 'PCç«¯ (1920px+)';
+             } else if (width >= 1600) {
+                 breakpoint = 'å¤§å± (1600px-1920px)';
+             } else if (width >= 1400) {
+                 breakpoint = 'ä¸­å¤§å± (1400px-1600px)';
+             } else if (width >= 1200) {
+                 breakpoint = 'ä¸­å± (1200px-1400px)';
+             } else if (width >= 992) {
+                 breakpoint = 'å°å± (992px-1200px)';
+             } else if (width >= 768) {
+                 breakpoint = 'å¹³æ¿ (768px-992px)';
+             } else if (width >= 480) {
+                 breakpoint = 'ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯ (480px-768px)';
+             } else {
+                 breakpoint = 'å°ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯ (480pxä»¥ä¸‹)';
+             }
+             
+             indicator.textContent = `${breakpoint} (${width}px)`;
+         }

+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–

+         window.addEventListener('resize', updateBreakpoint);

+         document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item').forEach(item => {
+             item.addEventListener('click', (e) => {

+                 setTimeout(() => {
+                     item.style.background = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)';
```

## æ€»ç»“

æˆ‘å·²ç»æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆäº†å¯¼èˆªæ å’Œé¡µé¢å®½åº¦çš„å¼¹æ€§è®¾è®¡ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œä¸»è¦å®ç°äº†ä»¥ä¸‹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼š

### ğŸ¯ ä¸»è¦ä¼˜åŒ–å†…å®¹

#### 1. **èœå•ç»“æ„è°ƒæ•´**
- âœ… **æ‰“å°è®¾è®¡å™¨** å’Œ **æŠ¥è¡¨è®¾è®¡å™¨** å·²ä»"æ›´å¤š"èœå•ä¸­æå–åˆ°å¤–å±‚æ˜¾ç¤º
- âœ… ä½¿ç”¨äº†ä¸“é—¨çš„å›¾æ ‡ï¼šæ‰“å°è®¾è®¡å™¨ç”¨æ‰“å°æœºå›¾æ ‡ï¼ŒæŠ¥è¡¨è®¾è®¡å™¨ç”¨å›¾è¡¨å›¾æ ‡
- âœ… ä»ªè¡¨ç›˜è®¾è®¡å™¨å›¾æ ‡æ”¹ä¸ºMonitorï¼Œé¿å…ä¸æŠ¥è¡¨è®¾è®¡å™¨é‡å¤

#### 2. **å¼¹æ€§å¸ƒå±€è®¾è®¡**
- âœ… æ”¯æŒæ°´å¹³æ»šåŠ¨ï¼Œéšè—æ»šåŠ¨æ¡ä¿æŒç¾è§‚

5. æœ€åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸»è®¾è®¡å™¨å®¹å™¨ç»„ä»¶æ¥ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›å¸ƒå±€ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <div class="designer-container">
+     <!-- å·¦ä¾§ç»„ä»¶é¢æ¿ -->
+     <div class="component-panel">
+       <slot name="component-panel"></slot>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- ä¸­é—´ç”»å¸ƒåŒºåŸŸ -->
+     <div class="canvas-container">
+       <div class="canvas-content">
+         <slot name="canvas"></slot>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+ 
+     <!-- å³ä¾§å±æ€§é¢æ¿ -->
+     <div class="property-panel">
+       <slot name="property-panel"></slot>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { onMounted } from 'vue';
+ import '@/styles/designer-layout.scss';
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶ç¡®ä¿å¸ƒå±€æ­£ç¡®æ˜¾ç¤º
+ onMounted(() => {
+   // è·å–å®¹å™¨å®½åº¦
+   const container = document.querySelector('.designer-container');
+   if (!container) return;
+   
+   const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
+   
+   // è®¡ç®—æœ€å°æ‰€éœ€å®½åº¦
+   const minComponentWidth = 200;  // å·¦ä¾§é¢æ¿æœ€å°å®½åº¦
+   const minCanvasWidth = 600;     // ç”»å¸ƒæœ€å°å®½åº¦
+   const minPropertyWidth = 240;   // å³ä¾§é¢æ¿æœ€å°å®½åº¦
+   
+   const minTotalWidth = minComponentWidth + minCanvasWidth + minPropertyWidth;
+   
+   // å¦‚æœå®¹å™¨å®½åº¦ä¸è¶³ï¼Œè°ƒæ•´å¸ƒå±€
+   if (containerWidth < minTotalWidth) {
+     const componentPanel = container.querySelector('.component-panel');
+     const propertyPanel = container.querySelector('.property-panel');
+     
+     if (componentPanel && propertyPanel) {
+       // è°ƒæ•´é¢æ¿å®½åº¦ä»¥é€‚åº”å®¹å™¨
+       const panelWidth = Math.max(180, Math.floor((containerWidth - minCanvasWidth) / 2));
+       (componentPanel as HTMLElement).style.width = `${panelWidth}px`;
+       (propertyPanel as HTMLElement).style.width = `${panelWidth}px`;
+     }
+   }
+ });
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .designer-container {
+   position: relative;
+   width: 100%;
+   height: 100%;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+   let timeout: NodeJS.Timeout;
+   return function executedFunction(...args: any[]) {
+     const later = () => {
+       clearTimeout(timeout);
+       func(...args);
+     };
+     clearTimeout(timeout);
+     timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
+   };
+ };
```

```diff
+         function updateSizeIndicator() {
+             const indicator = document.getElementById('sizeIndicator');
+             const container = document.getElementById('designerContainer');
+             const componentPanel = document.getElementById('componentPanel');
+             const propertyPanel = document.getElementById('propertyPanel');
+             const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');

+                 å·¦ä¾§: ${componentWidth}px<br>
+                 ç”»å¸ƒ: ${canvasWidth}px<br>
+                 å³ä¾§: ${propertyWidth}px
+             `;
+         }
+ 
+         // è°ƒæ•´çª—å£å¤§å°ï¼ˆä»…ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•ï¼‰
+         function resizeWindow(width, height) {
+             const container = document.getElementById('designerContainer');
+             container.style.width = width + 'px';
+             container.style.height = height + 'px';
+             
+             // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
+             document.querySelectorAll('.resize-btn').forEach(btn => {
+                 btn.classList.remove('active');
+             });
+             event.target.classList.add('active');
+             
+             setTimeout(updateSizeIndicator, 100);
+         }
+ 
+         // æ™ºèƒ½å¸ƒå±€è°ƒæ•´
+         function adjustLayout() {
+             const container = document.getElementById('designerContainer');
+             const componentPanel = document.getElementById('componentPanel');
+             const propertyPanel = document.getElementById('propertyPanel');
+             const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');
+             
+             const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
+             
+             let componentWidth, propertyWidth, minCanvasWidth;
+             
+             if (containerWidth >= 1440) {

+             } else if (containerWidth >= 1200) {
+                 componentWidth = 200;
+                 propertyWidth = 240;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 400;
+             } else if (containerWidth >= 1024) {
+                 componentWidth = 180;

+                 minCanvasWidth = 350;

+                 propertyWidth = 200;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 300;
+             } else {
+                 componentWidth = 140;
+                 propertyWidth = 180;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 250;
+             }
+             
+             const totalSidebarWidth = componentWidth + propertyWidth;
+             
+             if (containerWidth < totalSidebarWidth + minCanvasWidth) {

+                 const ratio = availableWidth / totalSidebarWidth;
+                 
+                 if (ratio > 0.6) {

+                 } else {
```

#### 3. æ™ºèƒ½å¸ƒå±€ç®—æ³•
```javascript
// æ ¹æ®å®¹å™¨å®½åº¦åŠ¨æ€è®¡ç®—é¢æ¿å®½åº¦
const adjustLayout = () => {
  const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
  
  // è®¡ç®—ç†æƒ³å®½åº¦
  let componentWidth, propertyWidth, minCanvasWidth;
  
  // æ£€æŸ¥ç©ºé—´æ˜¯å¦è¶³å¤Ÿ
  if (containerWidth < totalSidebarWidth + minCanvasWidth) {
    // æŒ‰æ¯”ä¾‹ç¼©å°æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨æœ€å°å®½åº¦
    const availableWidth = containerWidth - minCanvasWidth;
    const ratio = availableWidth / totalSidebarWidth;
    
    if (ratio > 0.6) {
      // æŒ‰æ¯”ä¾‹ç¼©æ”¾
      componentWidth = Math.floor(componentWidth * ratio);
      propertyWidth = Math.floor(propertyWidth * ratio);
    } else {
      // ä½¿ç”¨æœ€å°å®½åº¦
      componentWidth = Math.max(120, Math.floor(availableWidth * 0.4));
      propertyWidth = Math.max(140, availableWidth - componentWidth);
    }
  }
};
```

ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘æ·»åŠ  JavaScript é€»è¾‘æ¥å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½å¸ƒå±€è°ƒæ•´ï¼š

```diff
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–å†å²è®°å½•
    handleSaveHistory('åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¨¡æ¿');
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ å¸ƒå±€è°ƒæ•´é€»è¾‘
+   adjustDesignerLayout();
+   window.addEventListener('resize', handleWindowResize);
  });
  
  onUnmounted(() => {
    document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
- });
+   window.removeEventListener('resize', handleWindowResize);
+ });
+ 
+ // æ™ºèƒ½å¸ƒå±€è°ƒæ•´
+ const adjustDesignerLayout = () => {
+   const designerContent = document.querySelector('.designer-content');
+   if (!designerContent) return;
+   
+   const containerWidth = designerContent.clientWidth;
+   const componentPanel = document.querySelector('.component-panel-container');
+   const propertyPanel = document.querySelector('.property-panel-container');
+   const canvasContainer = document.querySelector('.canvas-container');
+   
+   if (!componentPanel || !propertyPanel || !canvasContainer) return;
+   
+   let componentWidth: number;
+   let propertyWidth: number;
+   let minCanvasWidth: number;
+   
+   // æ ¹æ®å±å¹•å®½åº¦åŠ¨æ€è®¡ç®—é¢æ¿å®½åº¦
+   if (containerWidth >= 1440) {
+     componentWidth = 220;
+     propertyWidth = 260;
+     minCanvasWidth = 500;
+   } else if (containerWidth >= 1200) {
+     componentWidth = 200;
+     propertyWidth = 240;
+     minCanvasWidth = 400;
+   } else if (containerWidth >= 1024) {
+     componentWidth = 180;
+     propertyWidth = 220;
+     minCanvasWidth = 350;
+   } else if (containerWidth >= 768) {
+     componentWidth = 160;
+     propertyWidth = 200;
+     minCanvasWidth = 300;
+   } else {
+     componentWidth = 140;
+     propertyWidth = 180;
+     minCanvasWidth = 250;
+   }
+   
+   const totalSidebarWidth = componentWidth + propertyWidth;
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿç©ºé—´
+   if (containerWidth < totalSidebarWidth + minCanvasWidth) {
+     const availableWidth = containerWidth - minCanvasWidth;
+     const ratio = availableWidth / totalSidebarWidth;
+     
+     if (ratio > 0.6) {
+       componentWidth = Math.floor(componentWidth * ratio);
+       propertyWidth = Math.floor(propertyWidth * ratio);
+     } else {
+       componentWidth = Math.max(120, Math.floor(availableWidth * 0.4));
+       propertyWidth = Math.max(140, availableWidth - componentWidth);
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åº”ç”¨è®¡ç®—å‡ºçš„å®½åº¦
+   (componentPanel as HTMLElement).style.width = `${componentWidth}px`;
+   (propertyPanel as HTMLElement).style.width = `${propertyWidth}px`;
+ };
+ 
+ // é˜²æŠ–å¤„ç†çª—å£å¤§å°å˜åŒ–
+ let resizeTimeout: number;
+ const handleWindowResize = () => {
+   clearTimeout(resizeTimeout);
+   resizeTimeout = window.setTimeout(adjustDesignerLayout, 100);
+ };
  
  // æ¨¡æ¿åˆ‡æ¢å¤„ç†
```

```diff
+         <button class="resize-btn" onclick="resizeWindow(1440, 900)">1440x900</button>

+         <button class="resize-btn" onclick="resizeWindow(768, 1024)">768x1024</button>

+     <script>
+         // æ›´æ–°å°ºå¯¸æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
+         function updateSizeIndicator() {
+             const indicator = document.getElementById('sizeIndicator');
+             const container = document.getElementById('designerContent');
+             const componentPanel = document.getElementById('componentPanel');
+             const propertyPanel = document.getElementById('propertyPanel');
+             const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');
+             
+             const containerWidth = container.clientWidth;
+             const componentWidth = componentPanel.clientWidth;
+             const propertyWidth = propertyPanel.clientWidth;
+             const canvasWidth = canvasContainer.clientWidth;
+             
+             indicator.innerHTML = `
+                 å®¹å™¨: ${containerWidth}px<br>
+                 å·¦ä¾§: ${componentWidth}px<br>
+                 ç”»å¸ƒ: ${canvasWidth}px<br>
+                 å³ä¾§: ${propertyWidth}px
+             `;
+         }
+ 
+         // è°ƒæ•´çª—å£å¤§å°ï¼ˆä»…ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•ï¼‰
+         function resizeWindow(width, height) {
+             const container = document.getElementById('designerContent');
+             container.style.width = width + 'px';
+             container.style.height = (height - 60) + 'px'; // å‡å»å¤´éƒ¨é«˜åº¦
+             
+             // æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
+             document.querySelectorAll('.resize-btn').forEach(btn => {
+                 btn.classList.remove('active');
+             });
+             event.target.classList.add('active');
+             
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 adjustDesignerLayout();
+                 updateSizeIndicator();
+             }, 100);
+         }
+ 
+         // æ™ºèƒ½å¸ƒå±€è°ƒæ•´
+         function adjustDesignerLayout() {
+             const designerContent = document.getElementById('designerContent');
+             if (!designerContent) return;
+             
+             const containerWidth = designerContent.clientWidth;
+             const componentPanel = document.getElementById('componentPanel');
+             const propertyPanel = document.getElementById('propertyPanel');
+             const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');
+             
+             if (!componentPanel || !propertyPanel || !canvasContainer) return;
+             
+             let componentWidth, propertyWidth, minCanvasWidth;
+             
+             // æ ¹æ®å±å¹•å®½åº¦åŠ¨æ€è®¡ç®—é¢æ¿å®½åº¦
+             if (containerWidth >= 1440) {
+                 componentWidth = 220;
+                 propertyWidth = 260;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 500;
+             } else if (containerWidth >= 1200) {
+                 componentWidth = 200;
+                 propertyWidth = 240;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 400;
+             } else if (containerWidth >= 1024) {
+                 componentWidth = 180;
+                 propertyWidth = 220;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 350;
+             } else if (containerWidth >= 768) {
+                 componentWidth = 160;
+                 propertyWidth = 200;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 300;
+             } else {
+                 componentWidth = 140;
+                 propertyWidth = 180;
+                 minCanvasWidth = 250;
+             }
+             
+             const totalSidebarWidth = componentWidth + propertyWidth;
+             
+             // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿç©ºé—´
+             if (containerWidth < totalSidebarWidth + minCanvasWidth) {
+                 const availableWidth = containerWidth - minCanvasWidth;
+                 const ratio = availableWidth / totalSidebarWidth;
+                 
+                 if (ratio > 0.6) {
+                     componentWidth = Math.floor(componentWidth * ratio);
+                     propertyWidth = Math.floor(propertyWidth * ratio);
+                 } else {
+                     componentWidth = Math.max(120, Math.floor(availableWidth * 0.4));
+                     propertyWidth = Math.max(140, availableWidth - componentWidth);
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             // åº”ç”¨è®¡ç®—å‡ºçš„å®½åº¦
+             componentPanel.style.width = componentWidth + 'px';
+             propertyPanel.style.width = propertyWidth + 'px';
+             
+             updateSizeIndicator();
+         }
+ 
+         // é˜²æŠ–å¤„ç†çª—å£å¤§å°å˜åŒ–
+         let resizeTimeout;
+         function handleWindowResize() {
+             clearTimeout(resizeTimeout);
+             resizeTimeout = setTimeout(adjustDesignerLayout, 100);
+         }
+ 
+         // ç›‘å¬çª—å£å¤§å°å˜åŒ–
+         window.addEventListener('resize', handleWindowResize);
+         
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+         document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+             adjustDesignerLayout();
+             updateSizeIndicator();
+         });
+ 
+         // ä½¿ç”¨ ResizeObserver ç›‘å¬å®¹å™¨å˜åŒ–
+         if ('ResizeObserver' in window) {
+             const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(handleWindowResize);
+             resizeObserver.observe(document.getElementById('designerContent'));
+         }
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

```diff
+ // é€‰æ‹©æ•°æ®é›†
+ const selectDataset = (dataset: any) => {
+   selectedDataset.value = dataset
+   // å¦‚æœé€‰ä¸­äº†æ•°æ®é›†ï¼Œé»˜è®¤æ˜¾ç¤ºè¯¦æƒ…æ ‡ç­¾é¡µ
+   if (activeTab.value !== 'details' && activeTab.value !== 'fields' && activeTab.value !== 'preview') {

+ const handleCommand = (command: string) => {
+   const [action, id] = command.split('-')
+   const datasetId = Number(id)
+   
+   switch (action) {
+     case 'toggle':
+       toggleDatasetStatus(selectedDataset.value)
+       break
+     case 'delete':
+       confirmDelete(datasetId)
+       break
+   }
+ }
```

## ä¼˜åŒ–æ€»ç»“

æˆ‘å·²ç»æˆåŠŸä¼˜åŒ–äº†æ•°æ®é›†ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢çš„å¸ƒå±€å’ŒUIè®¾è®¡ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ”¹è¿›åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š

### ğŸ¨ **å¸ƒå±€ä¼˜åŒ–**
1. **å·¦å³åˆ†æ è®¾è®¡**ï¼šå°†æ•°æ®é›†è¯¦æƒ…ä»ä¸‹æ–¹ç§»åˆ°å³ä¾§ï¼Œç¬¦åˆç”¨æˆ·ä¹ æƒ¯

```diff
+ const handleTabChange = (tabName: string) => {

+ // è·å–ç±»å‹æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼
+ const getTypeTag = (type: string) => {
+   switch (type.toLowerCase()) {
+     case 'mysql':
+       return 'success'
+     case 'postgresql':
+       return 'primary'
+     case 'oracle':
+       return 'warning'
+     case 'sqlserver':
+       return 'info'
+     default:
+       return 'info'
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•å‘½ä»¤
+ const handleCommand = (command: string) => {
+   const [action, id] = command.split('-')
+   const dataSourceId = Number(id)
+   
+   switch (action) {
+     case 'toggle':
+       toggleDataSourceStatus(selectedDataSource.value)
+       break
+     case 'delete':
+       confirmDelete(dataSourceId)
+       break
+   }
+ }
```

```diff
+   }
```

```diff
+ // è·å–ç±»å‹æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼
+ const getTypeTag = (type: string) => {
+   switch (type.toLowerCase()) {
+     case 'mysql':
+       return 'success'
+     case 'postgresql':
+       return 'primary'
+     case 'oracle':
+       return 'warning'
+     case 'sqlserver':
+       return 'info'
+     default:
+       return 'info'
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•å‘½ä»¤
+ const handleCommand = (command: string) => {
+   const [action, id] = command.split('-')
+   const dataSourceId = Number(id)
+   
+   switch (action) {
+     case 'toggle':
+       toggleDataSourceStatus(selectedDataSource.value)
+       break
+     case 'delete':
+       confirmDelete(dataSourceId)
+       break
+   }
+ }
```

å®Œç¾ï¼æˆ‘å·²ç»æˆåŠŸå°†æ•°æ®é›†ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢çš„ç°ä»£åŒ–è®¾è®¡é£æ ¼å®Œå…¨ç§»æ¤åˆ°æ•°æ®æºç®¡ç†é¡µé¢ã€‚ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘æ€»ç»“ä¸€ä¸‹ä¸»è¦çš„æ”¹è¿›ï¼š

## æ•°æ®æºç®¡ç†é¡µé¢æ ·å¼ç§»æ¤æ€»ç»“

### ğŸ¨ ä¸»è¦æ”¹è¿›å†…å®¹ï¼š

#### 1. **é¡µé¢å¤´éƒ¨é‡è®¾è®¡**

```diff
+ // ç›‘å¬æ ‡ç­¾é¡µåˆ‡æ¢
+ const handleTabChange = (tabName: string) => {

+   }

+ // è·å–ç±»å‹æ ‡ç­¾æ ·å¼
+ const getTypeTag = (type: string) => {
+   switch (type.toLowerCase()) {
+     case 'mysql':
+       return 'success'
+     case 'postgresql':
+       return 'primary'
+     case 'oracle':
+       return 'warning'
+     case 'sqlserver':
+       return 'info'
+     default:
+       return 'info'
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•å‘½ä»¤
+ const handleCommand = (command: string) => {
+   const [action, id] = command.split('-')
+   const dataSourceId = Number(id)
+   
+   switch (action) {
+     case 'toggle':
+       toggleDataSourceStatus(selectedDataSource.value)
+       break
+     case 'delete':
+       confirmDelete(dataSourceId)
+       break
+   }
+ }
```
